Name: Average time from SW-EIC Accept to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to occur after First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time elapsed from SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total waiting time to the Awaiting Assignment to Batch following Manuscript Export Succeeded in final acceptance paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to be done after the completion of all revision cycles
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time from SW-EIC Accept to Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared with time from RW-EIC Accept to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time for Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants ending with Manuscript Export Succeeded post-acceptance
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time between Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation (final revision) and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch following First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time elapsed between Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in complex variant paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time until Awaiting Assignment to Batch is performed after the last occurrence of Manuscript Export Succeeded in an accepted case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time from SW–Minor Revision due in 3 days to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in minor revision acceptance flows
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW–Minor Revision due in 3 days'", 'end': "activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'total'}"
